name: Friend Zone: To Do List
description:
If you enjoyed the game, support it(and us) by rating and/or dropping comments! Each one of you counts!⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ 👇🏽Play the previous games in the series!👇🏽 

 

Play Friend Zone 1: Undress Me!Play Friend Zone 2: Pledge! It's Summer Break and the crew is visiting Miami! Share tropical drinks together, bathe in the sun, and  get closer with your friends... and enemies. 🍹Diamond- You play as Diamond (Nameable/Customizable), As the leader of her own blossoming  college club, she searches the beaches of Miami for potential members while also having fun in the sun. 🍹Sip cocktails on the beach as you play through your choices and make or break relationships as Diamond.  🍹Our web comic themed dating sim makes for a very visually pleasing play experience. 🍹This is the 3rd episode in the ever-expanding Friend Zone series ! This game was made by me "MoonCaustics" (Artist/Editor) and "Beastcarving"(Coding/Writer/UI), check out our other projects!
